missingDates.title: Missing Dates Query
missingDates.subtitle: Identify missing dates and editions in publications
missingDates.fileListDesc: Upload a YAML, JSON or list file
missingDates.startDateOptional: Optional - leave blank to include from beginning
missingDates.endDateOptional: Optional - leave blank to include until end
missingDates.noResultsDescription: No missing dates were found for the selected publication. This indicates that the collection is complete for the analyzed period.
missingDates.noDataDescription: No data has been processed for this publication. Upload data files through the Ingestion module to start the analysis.
missingDates.emptyStateDescription: Choose a specific publication to identify missing dates and editions in its historical collection.
missingDates.info: This analysis identifies missing dates in historical newspaper collections, helping to identify gaps in digitization.

duplicates.title: Duplicates Query
duplicates.subtitle: Identify duplicate records in publications
duplicates.noDuplicatesDescription: No duplicate records were found for the selected criteria. This indicates that the data is clean and without duplications.
duplicates.noDataDescription: No data has been processed yet to analyze duplicates. Upload data files through the Ingestion module to start the analysis.
duplicates.emptyStateTitle: Search for duplicates in your data
duplicates.emptyStateDescription: Use the filters to search for duplicate records in publications. You can filter by specific publication or search across all.
duplicates.info: Duplicates are automatically detected during data processing. This query shows records that appear multiple times in the same publication and date.

dailyEntries.title: Daily Entries
dailyEntries.subtitle: Query the number of entries per day in publications
dailyEntries.noResults: No entries found for the specified criteria
dailyEntries.dateRangeHelp: If no dates are specified, the last 30 days will be shown

knownEntities.title: Known Entities
knownEntities.subtitle: Query known entities uploaded to the system
knownEntities.name: Name

pendingFiles.title: Pending Files
pendingFiles.subtitle: Query pending ingestion files to be processed

ingestion.title: Data Ingestion
ingestion.subtitle: Upload extraction data or known entities files to the system
ingestion.selectPublicationFirst: Please select a publication before uploading files
ingestion.dragFiles: Drag files here or click to select
ingestion.separateProcesses: Ingestion processes are separated to avoid conflicts. Only one file type can be processed at a time.
ingestion.asyncProcessing: Processing is asynchronous. You will receive immediate confirmation, but complete processing may take several minutes.
ingestion.temporaryStorage: Files are stored temporarily and deleted after processing.
ingestion.bulkUpload: Bulk Upload: Processes multiple files simultaneously with automatic retries. You can pause, resume and monitor progress in real time.

notifications.selectFile: Please select a file to upload
notifications.selectPublicationForExtraction: Please select a publication for extraction data
notifications.bulkUploadStats: Successfully processed {{success}} files out of {{total}} total. {{records}} records processed.

configuration.title: System Metadata
configuration.subtitle: Management and audit of technical metadata

storageMetadata.title: Storage Metadata
storageMetadata.subtitle: Query information about data storage and transformations
storageMetadata.tableNameDesc: Name of the table to query data
storageMetadata.infoMessage: This query uses technical metadata tags to show detailed information about data storage.

processMetadata.title: Process Metadata
processMetadata.subtitle: Query information about executed processes and transformations
processMetadata.processNameDesc: Filter by specific transformation process name
processMetadata.infoMessage: This query shows information about executed loading and transformation processes.

login.subtitle: Data Ingestion and Analysis System
login.instructions: Enter your username to access the system
login.copyright: © 2024 PortAda. Data Ingestion and Analysis System.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome, {{name}}. Here is a summary of the system.

actions.analyzeDatesDesc: Search for missing dates in the data
